attributes.action: Pay married women a pension based on contributions made through the reduced stamp.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having paid a married womens reduced NI stamp for thirty years, I now find I get absolutely no pension.  No pension can be paid to me on my husband's contributions until he reaches 65.  This is ridiculous.  Surely a pension could be paid based on the reduced contributions already paid.  The government should look into this immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
